name: Droid-Land Mage v1
description:
//

Hello There!

Droid-Land Mage is a fun little arcade game where you play as a Mage in an alien world, summoned to protect the land against droids.

- Aim towards droids by using // A and D // 
- Smash the corresponding // Arrow Keys // on top of those droids to destroy them.
- Hit // Space // when your bar is full to Unleash and slow down time to help you out. 

Weaken droids to charge your meter. Landing final blows on droids does not charge your meter.

//

This was made as a school project submission where I wanted to outdo my classmates and I think I have done so.

Let me know what you think about it :)
